cooked:
Hi,

I’m a french IT engineer in holiday for a short time in Boulder, CO until the 31 of march.
I used some of my free time in the last day to sensibilise myself ( a little bit more…) on sustainable development issue. It looks to me that the OSHWA is exactly about that, applied to the IT / electronic world.
I like it, and I would love to know more about what you are doing.

I’m pretty sure lots of information are already available on your website. However,I would like to seize the opportunity of directly meeting some members of this association since I am in Boulder and there is nothing like a good old IRL discussion

Some word about me:
I am interested in network and telecommunication technologies, which are often a good mix of hardware and software. Besides that, i like photography, open source software, inline skate and blizzard video game.
If someone want to meet for an discussion , please let me know here. We will figure it out .

cheers,

Nicolas
raw:
Hi,

I'm a french IT engineer in holiday for a short time in Boulder, CO until the 31 of march.
I used some of my free time in the last day to sensibilise myself ( a little bit more...) on sustainable development issue. It looks to me that the OSHWA is exactly about that, applied to the IT / electronic world.
I like it, and I would love to know more about what you are doing. 

I'm pretty sure lots of information are already available on your website. However,I would like to seize the opportunity of directly meeting some members of this association since I am in Boulder and there is nothing like a good old IRL discussion :grin:

Some word about me:
I am interested in network and telecommunication technologies, which are often a good mix of hardware and software. Besides that, i like photography, open source software, inline skate and blizzard video game. 
If someone want to meet for an discussion , please let me know here. We will figure it out .

cheers,

Nicolas
